analyzed: ▁khaṇ a lay amu hu tt akathā

original: Khaṇo parinipphanno, layo parinipphanno, muhuttaṁ parinipphannanti?
analyzed: ▁khaṇ o ▁pari nipphann o ▁la yo ▁pari nipphann o ▁muhutt aṃ ▁pari nipphann anti

original: Atītaṁ vā, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ ārabbha kathaṁ katheyya—

etarahi vā, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ ārabbha kathaṁ katheyya—

analyzed: ▁khaṇ a lay amu hu tt akathā ▁niṭṭhitā
